titleStmt.title: Abstersæ lacrymæ, The poet buffoon'd, or, A vindication of the unfortunate ladies from the sawcy reflections in a late doggrel satyr against the famous lottery in Freemans-yard by a club of the fair sex for that purpose assembled.
titleStmt.author: Club of the Fair Sex.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Randal Taylor,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
